entries.quest_destroy_d: Destroy Elite Black Sun Venomrazors or Elite Black Sun Deathchargers.
entries.quest_location_d: '"I think it's occasionally good for us to remember that being a smuggler doesn't necessarily require one to be a barbarian, too." -- Talon Karrde.'
entries.split_quest_alert: Dartas Pytin: <The last surviving commander, Lieutenant Commander Rilis, is making a run for it! Keep your eyes open!>
entries.title: The Trinity: Defenses of the Darkveil Eclipse
entries.title_d: 'The Car'das are bringing down the defenses of the main hub, the Darkveil Eclipse. I've been tasked to destroy the enemy ships around it. I should concentrate on the Elite Black Sun Deathchargers and the Elite Black Sun Venomrazors. It will be a difficult battle indeed.'
